summary: This document is an internal email correspondence involving Lisa Hurd and Amanda Kirby from Deutsche Bank regarding the status of certain financial positions related to a shell account. The email indicates ongoing communication about account management and positions held by Southern Financial.

persons.name: Lisa Hurd
persons.context: Lisa Hurd is mentioned as a contact at Deutsche Bank who is being asked for updates regarding account positions.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is the sender of the email, inquiring about the status of account positions and following up on previous communications.

persons.name: Harry Seller
persons.context: Harry Seller is mentioned as the original sender of the forwarded email regarding Southern Financial.

connections.description: Amanda Kirby is reaching out to Lisa Hurd for updates on account management, indicating a working relationship within Deutsche Bank.
Amanda Kirby forwards an email from Harry Seller, indicating they are colleagues within the same organization.

keyFacts: The document is an internal email correspondence dated October 21, 2013.
Lisa Hurd is involved in private wealth management at Deutsche Bank.
Amanda Kirby is an associate at Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas.
The email discusses the status of financial positions related to a shell account for Southern Financial.
Harry Seller is mentioned as the original sender of a forwarded email regarding the same subject.
